Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: NoQarun noFaro noHaman futhi ngempela uMose wafika kubona nezimpawu ezicacile kepha bazikhukhumeza emhlabeni futhi babengeke baphunyuke (esijezisweni)

Ngakho-ke ngamunye sambamba ngesono sakhe phakathi kwabo kunalabo esabathumelela ngesichotho futhi phakathi kwabo kunalabo abathathwa ngumsindo owesabekayo futhi phakathi kwabo kunalabo esabagwinyisa ngomhlabathi futhi phakathi kwabo kunalabo esabaminzisa futhi akusiyena uMvelinqangi owenza okungalungile kubona kepha imiphefumulo yabo eyenza okungalungile

Isibonelo salabo abathatha (onkulunkulu bamanga) njengabavikeli esikhundleni sikaMvelinqangi sifana nesicabucabu esakha indlu futhi ngempela ezindlini eziyizintengentenge kakhulu yindlu yesicabucabu ukube nje babazi
Ngempela uMvelinqangi wazi noma ngabe yini abayimemezayo esikhundleni sakhe futhi yena uphakekeme ngamandla unobuhlakani
Futhi lezo yizibonelo esizenzela abantu futhi akekho oziqondayo ngaphandle kwabafundile
UMvelinqangi wadala amazulu nomhlaba ngeqiniso, ngempela kulokho kunophawu kwabakholwayo

Funda lokho okwembulwa kuwena okusencwadini futhi wenze umthandazo, ngempela umthandazo wenqabela ezonweni nasezenzweni ezimbi futhi ngempela inkumbulo kaMvelinqangi yinkulu kakhulu, futhi uMvelinqangi uyakwazi lokho enikwenzayo
